Description.p: A subset of SNOMED-CT intended for use in the UK, a set of codes which represent different aspects of personal emotional wellbeing, including mood, behaviour and impaired cognitive functioning. This vocab contains multiple distinct sub-sets of codes.

The list of subsets are as follows:
Any code from the SNOMED CT UK Mood subset with subset original id 7741000000135.

p.strong: Any code from the SNOMED CT UK Behaviour subset with subset original id 7751000000137.

Description.p:
Any code from the SNOMED CT UK Cognition subset with subset original id 7761000000139.
The use of this subset is Advisory as defined in latest version of "NPFIT-ELIBR-AREL-P1R2-0178 Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains."
